name: Product Launch
description: Announce brand‑new releases or major upgrades for Ethena products (USDe, sUSDe, ENA staking portals, new chains, etc.). Emphasise how the launch benefits users.

style_guidelines.length: Punchy; one or two short sentences under 240 characters with an action link
style_guidelines.emojis: Sparingly; rockets 🚀, sparkles ✨, and check marks ✅
style_guidelines.call_to_action: Invite users to test, bridge, or read the official launch blog.

name: Milestone & Partnership
description: Share significant TVL milestones, major exchange listings, strategic investments, or integrations with other DeFi protocols.

style_guidelines.length: Straight to the point; headline + key metric
style_guidelines.call_to_action: Link to partnership details or celebratory thread.

name: Community & Education
description: Educate and engage the community with tutorials, polls, trivia, and spotlight stories from USDe users.

style_guidelines.call_to_action: Request feedback, poll votes, or user stories.

name: Security & Risk Alert
description: Provide transparency on audits, risk parameter changes, insurance fund updates, or phishing alerts.

style_guidelines.length: Clear and unambiguous; mention action items if any
style_guidelines.call_to_action: Direct users to security docs or support channels.

name: Yield Update
description: Highlight changes in sUSDe APY, funding‑rate trends, or distribution of staking rewards.

style_guidelines.length: Include headline metric; keep it under 240 characters
style_guidelines.call_to_action: Invite users to stake or read the detailed yield blog.

name: Governance Vote
description: Announce upcoming or active ENA governance proposals, voting deadlines, and summaries of key decisions.

style_guidelines.length: State proposal title + deadline; keep concise
style_guidelines.call_to_action: Encourage ENA holders to read and vote.
